mapper.select: select * from cookie c join site_account sa on c.site_account_id = sa.id join site s on sa.site_id =s.id where sa.site_id = 1 and s.enable_status = 1 and sa.enable_status = 1 and sa.block_timeout_time < current_timestamp
delete from cookie c where c.site_id in ( select s.id from site s where c.site_id =s.id and c.current_block_count > s.cookie_max_block_count or c.expire_time < current_timestamp )
